menu.menudata: select ifnull(round(tracks.year/10)*10,0),ifnull(round(tracks.year/10)*10,'Unknown') from tracks where tracks.audio=1 group by round(tracks.year/10)*10 order by tracks.year asc;

select albums.id,albums.title,substr(albums.titlesort,1,1) from tracks,albums where tracks.audio=1 and albums.id=tracks.album and ifnull(tracks.year,0)>={year} and ifnull(tracks.year,0)<{year}+10 group by albums.id order by albums.titlesort

select tracks.id,tracks.title from tracks,albums where tracks.audio=1 and tracks.album={album} and ifnull(tracks.year,0)>={year} and ifnull(tracks.year,0)<{year}+10 group by tracks.id order by tracks.tracknum asc,tracks.titlesort asc
